Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Metropark Hotel Kowloon places you in the heart of Kowloon, minutes from Mong Kok Computer Centre and close to Ladies' Market. This 4-star hotel is close to Hong Kong Coliseum and International Commerce Centre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 487 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, and LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including a fitness center and a seasonal outdoor pool. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and wedding services. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the complimentary area shuttle.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Kowloon? This hotel has 861 square feet (80 square meters) of space consisting of conference space, meeting rooms, and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Mong Kok Computer Centre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Ladies' Market - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Kwong Wah Hospital - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Tung Wah Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Grand Century Place - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Kowloon Hospital - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Yuen Po Bird Market - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Langham Place Mall - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Flower Market - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Fa Hui Park - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Queen Elizabeth Hospital - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Ko Shan Road Park - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Jade Market - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Yau Ma Tei Fruit Market - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Olympian City Shopping Mall - 1.6 km / 1 mi

The preferred airport for Metropark Hotel Kowloon is Hong Kong (HKG-Hong Kong Intl.) - 24.6 km / 15.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No date, name and room change allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. Rates not valid during fair periods. late cancellation will be subjected to 1 night charge. Swimming pool opening schedule: March to December, from 7.30hrs until 19.30hrs daily and will be closed from January to February but sun bathing at the poolside is still available

Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No date, name and room change allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. Rates not valid during fair periods. late cancellation will be subjected to 1 night charge. Swimming pool opening schedule: March to December, from 7.30hrs until 19.30hrs daily and will be closed from January to February but sun bathing at the poolside is still available

Room 1

Notice
With bookings that include children, please note that the children may be accommodated in the existing bedding and not in separate beds. An extra bed can often be provided at an extra charge pre travel or locally if required.


The hotel check in time is 1500 hours, check out is 1200 hours. Request of early check in will be subject to availability, however to guarantee early check in the room must be reserved for the night prior to the guest’s arrival. Request for late departure is subject to availability on the date of departure.


Please note that all rooms are non-smoking.


Please be informed that our Club Lounge will be temporarily closed from 24 September 2018 until further notice. During the lounge closure, the breakfast will be served at Palm Court Western Restaurant (1/F) while happy hours will be served at Sip Sip Bar (G/F).


Please note that the hotel swimming pool and fitness room opening hours has revised with effective date on 01 Dec 2018. Opening hours: 7:30am – 7:30pm. Closed in January (whole month) for annual maintenance.
